attributes.action: Investigate Russian interference into the 2016 Brexit referendum
attributes.additional_details:
It is imperative to UK democratic processes, society and in the public interest to know if the UK is subject to Russian interference. 

The Russia Report revealed that the UK government avoided looking into whether there was Russian interference.

It is vital that the public have the benefit of an independent investigation.
attributes.background: As per the Russian Report released 21/07/2020, it is important that the UK should hold an independent investigation in the 2016 Brexit referendum to determine whether there was Russian interference in the UK’s democratic processes.
